trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Gainesville
There were no other sightings in Gainesville on or around April 18th 2010
Summary: Boyfriend and I saw bright green triangular object hovering above the car, then zoom off in a split second.
divs: Sighting DetailsBoyfriend and I were driving back home to Athens, right outside of Gainesville I noticed a flourescent green triangle shape with perhaps a few other lines. It was hovering directly in front of our car, appearing to be several kilometers in the air and I don't know how far away. I wasn't able to compartmentalize the image well because as soon as I started staring at it, it seemed to zoom off into distance in a split second. It startled me because I had instantly realized that I was seeing something very bizzare, and I asked my boyfriend, "Did you see that?" And he said, "Yes, what in the world was it, a comet?" I responded,"Um, I think that was a UFO!" And he replied, "I think you're right, because a comet wouldn't have disappeared like that!" The end.
